data.title: Mazars opens new office in Finland, strengthening its presence in the Nordics
data.meta_description: 15 November 2023: Mazars, the international audit, tax and advisory firm, today announces the opening of a new office in Helsinki, Finland, strengthening its presence in the Nordics and further expanding its global reach and local presence.
data.text:
This expansion is part of Mazars’ overall growth strategy and builds upon its existing presence in the Nordics where the firm has offices in Denmark, Norway and Sweden. With this new presence in Finland, Mazars will draw on the expertise of nearly 40 partners and over 350 professionals to provide tailored solutions to its clients based in the Nordic region.

Nicolas Candy, formerly Head of Outsourcing at Mazars in Czech Republic, will lead the team in Helsinki. A French Foreign Trade Advisor (FFTA), Candy has over 10 years of experience in audit and spent the past 12 years leading accounting and reporting teams to advise international clients on global assignments across a wide range of sectors.

Commenting on his new role, Nicolas Candy, Managing Partner of Mazars in Finland, says: “I am excited to take on this opportunity, leading our new team in Helsinki and supporting clients in this market. Over the past few years, demand for support on complex audit and advisory challenges in Finland has increased and I look forward to bringing the Mazars approach to the Finnish market. We pride ourselves in providing a multidisciplinary offering where we strive to understand our clients’ way of working to offer them the advice and solutions they need to succeed on their own terms.”

This expansion reflects Mazars’ commitment to serving clients wherever they operate, with versatile teams who can provide an agile and personable approach that balances local expertise and international experience efficiently to guide them in their quest for sustainable growth.

Candy adds: “The Nordic countries have a longstanding shared history and culture. My team and I will work very closely with our colleagues in Denmark, Norway and Sweden to help clients navigate a rapidly evolving environment and prepare to make the most of future market opportunities.”

With the addition of Finland, Mazars is now present in over 100 countries and territories and continues to expand its global footprint to assist clients at every stage of their development and achieve their vision of success.

About Mazars

Mazars is an internationally integrated partnership, specialising in audit, accountancy, advisory, tax and legal services*. Operating in over 100 countries and territories around the world, we draw on the expertise of more than 47,000 professionals – 30,000+ in Mazars’ integrated partnership and 17,000+ via the Mazars North America Alliance – to assist clients of all sizes at every stage in their development.

*Where permitted under applicable country laws
